about_the_game:
Your duty as a South Korean army officer just began.

You must check out mysterious anomalies to finish this endless night.

An indie game inspired by following games:

[The Exit 8]

[False Mall]

[Night Watch:Closer]
detailed_description:
Your duty as a South Korean army officer just began.

You must check out mysterious anomalies to finish this endless night.

An indie game inspired by following games:

[The Exit 8]

[False Mall]

[Night Watch:Closer]
name: A Night Duty Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300X / Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5-8600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Your duty as an South Korean army officer just began.You must check out mysterious anomalies to finish this endless night.An indie game inspired by [The Backrooms] and [The Exit 8].
